Comment: Abilities: A010 (Mass Animate Dead), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Animates corpses in a large area to fight for the Lich King. Lasts 60 seconds.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Animates 20 corpses. 2 minute cooldown.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Animates 35 corpses. 2 minute cooldown. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Animates 50 corpses. 2 minute cooldown.
